column2: The 3-Step Hack That Doubled My Income
column3: I was stuck at the same number for years until I did these 3 steps: 1) Package one skill into a tiny product. 2) Put it where buyers already are. 3) Automate delivery and follow-up. Simple beats complicated.
column6: Split screen sad balance vs big deposit; bold '3 Steps'

column2: Two Time Wasters Killing Your Results
column3: Endless research and doing ten things at once. Pick ONE proven offer and spend 30 days shipping daily. You’ll outpace 99%.
column4: Save this and commit to 30 days.
column6: Clock with red X; focus target icon.

column3: AM: 20 min create. PM: 10 min check numbers. Evening: talk to 5 potential buyers. Repeat for 60 days. Compounding does the rest.
